Class PmWiki

java.lang.Object
  PmWiki

public class PmWiki
extends java.lang.Object

PmWiki is the class representing a PmWiki installation.

Author:
Johannes Perl

articleIsRelevant

public static boolean articleIsRelevant(java.lang.String articleName,
                                        java.lang.String articleNamespace)
Returns whether a link has to be parsed and converted into MediaWiki syntax (returns false for PmWiki specific pages).

Parameters:
articleName - the name of the article
articleNamespace - the namespace of the article
Returns:
the relevance of the article for the MediaWiki
